data.description: Spectacular listing in Covington with over 3200 heated square feet on 1.24 Acres not in a neighborhood. Featuring TOP OF THE LINE UPGRADES THROUGHOUT this home should've been on EXTREME HOME MAKEOVER! Nothing to do here but MOVE-IN! 5 Bedrooms/ 3.5 Baths plus an office, formal living room, formal dining room, family room, and HUGE master bedroom with SITTING AREA. RENOVATIONS since 2012 include (flooring, lighting, plumbing, paint, appliances, upgraded trim, extensive landscaping, new roof, (2) 50 gallon water heaters, ALL bathrooms RENOVATED from TOP to BOTTOM and much more... EVERYTHING in this home is HIGH END! BRAND NEW carpet and UPGRADED pad JUST INSTALLED! Transferable termite bond! Check out the tour link with 76 total photos it's a MUST SEE!
